Docs.summary: Represents the filter actions which are allowed for the transformation of a message that have been matched by a filter expression.
Docs.remarks: Filter actions allow for the transformation of a message that have been matched by a filter expression. The typical use case for filter actions is to append or update the properties that are attached to a message, for example assigning a group ID based on the correlation ID of a message.
